     decimal             k,

Initializes a new instance of the KeltnerChannels class.

Parameters
int period The period of the average true range and moving average (middle band).
decimal k The number of multiples specifying the distance between the middle band and upper or lower bands.
*MovingAverageType movingAverageType (Optional) /. Default: MovingAverageType.Simple

Return
